title: Investigation and comparison of the influence of modified DBR and yellow color filters for quantum dot color conversion-based micro LED applications
content:
Publication date: 30 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Bao-Le Dai, Jing-Wei Ji, Bing-Han Wu, Kuan-An Chen, Hideki Kuroda, Hung-Chen Kou, Tomohiro Akada, Chun-Yu Li
